verses.verse: Help <WH3467>, Lord <WH3068>; for the godly man <WH2623> ceases <WH1584>; for the faithful <WH539> fail <WH6461> from among the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
They speak <WH1696> vanity <WH7723> every one <WH376> with his neighbor <WH7453>: with flattering <WH2513> lips <WH8193> and with a double <WH3820> heart <WH3820> do they speak <WH1696>.
The Lord <WH3068> shall cut off <WH3772> all flattering <WH2513> lips <WH8193>, and the tongue <WH3956> that speaks <WH1696> proud things <WH1419>:
Who have said <WH559>, With our tongue <WH3956> will we prevail <WH1396>; our lips <WH8193> are our own <WH113>: who is lord over us?

For the oppression <WH7701> of the poor <WH6041>, for the sighing <WH603> of the needy <WH34>, now will I arise <WH6965>, says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; I will set <WH7896> him in safety <WH3468> from him that puffs at him <WH6315>.
The words <WH565> of the Lord <WH3068> are pure <WH2889> words <WH565>: as silver <WH3701> tried <WH6884> in a furnace <WH5948> of earth <WH776>, purified <WH2212> seven times <WH7659>.
You shall keep <WH8104> them <WH3068>, O Lord, you shall preserve <WH5341> them from this <WH2098> generation <WH1755> for ever <WH5769>.
The wicked <WH7563> walk <WH1980> on every side <WH5439>, when the vilest <WH2149> men <WH1121> are exalted <WH7311>.
